Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Note: "influenced the optical behavior" and "showed a nonlinear compositional dependence" imply that the ratio of DPP to TPD and the compositional dependence are properties of the material that affect the behavior of the material, so they are valid entities. However, "of the polymers" was removed as it is not a clear material property value.
